name: boosted
description: Orange Boosted with Bootstrap is a framework library accessible, ergonomic and Orange branded based on Bootstrap v4.0.0-alpha.6.
author: The Boosted Authors (https://github.com/Orange-OpenSource/Orange-Boosted-Bootstrap/graphs/contributors)

scripts.clean-css: cleancss --level 1 --source-map --output dist/css/boosted.min.css dist/css/boosted.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --output dist/css/boosted-grid.min.css dist/css/boosted-grid.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --output dist/css/boosted-reboot.min.css dist/css/boosted-reboot.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --output dist/css/boosted-rtl.min.css dist/css/boosted-rtl.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --output dist/css/orangeHelvetica.min.css dist/css/orangeHelvetica.css && cleancss --level 1 --source-map --output dist/css/orangeIcons.min.css dist/css/orangeIcons.css
scripts.eslint: eslint --ignore-path .eslintignore js && eslint --config js/tests/.eslintrc.json --env node grunt Gruntfile.js && eslint --config js/tests/.eslintrc.json .tmpdocs/assets/js/src .tmpdocs/assets/js/ie-emulation-modes-warning.js .tmpdocs/assets/js/ie10-viewport-bug-workaround.js
scripts.jekyll-github: shx echo 'github: true' > $npm_config_tmp/twbsjekyll.yml && npm run jekyll -- --config _config.yml,$npm_config_tmp/twbsjekyll.yml && shx rm $npm_config_tmp/twbsjekyll.yml
scripts.sass: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 scss/boosted.scss dist/css/boosted.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 scss/boosted-grid.scss dist/css/boosted-grid.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 scss/boosted-reboot.scss dist/css/boosted-reboot.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 scss/o-rtl.scss dist/css/o-rtl.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 scss/orangeHelvetica.scss dist/css/orangeHelvetica.css && node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --precision 6 scss/orangeIcons.scss dist/css/orangeIcons.css
